name: OverWorld (Tryall)
description:
This game was created by Tryall in 3 days for the 5th French Construct Game Jam. You can download the source-file. But be careful of the Copyright.

Controls :

  • Left and Right arrow to move
  • Up arrow to jump
  • Up and Down arrow to make a shocking wave (will move the blocks)
  • Press "R" to restart the current level.
  • Get the red shard to the portal. And go to the 2nd Portal who spawned after that.

I used Pyxel_Edit 0.4.3 for the Sprites.
Fruity Loops 12 for the Main music menu.
Construct 2 r213 for the Game Engine.

Tips : You can download the source file below for FREE. You don't have to pay (click the little link in grey on top of the "1€" payement option). But if you like what you seen in there, think to drop a little coin !
